item.title: codingPages中申请ssl报错
item.description: 错误码：urn:acme:error:unauthorized: Invalid response from http://idsze.cn/.well-known/acme-challenge/a_Dj4u6BkPX20lK8mGqlAHWHgoxT0YkqfVAzsrGS2TQ [185.199.108.153]: "<!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <meta http-equiv=\"Content-type\" content=\"text/html; charset=utf-8\"> <meta http-equiv=\"Co"

item.title: 本地环境伪造ssl证书
item.description:
1. 看到报错：curl: (60) SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate
  2. 下载证书 https://curl.haxx.se/ca/cacert.pem ，一般放在D:/wamp64/bin/php/php7.1.9/extras/ssl/cacert.pem
  3. 配置php.ini
curl.cainfo = "D:/wamp64/bin/php/php7.1.9/extras/ssl/cacert.pem"`
openssl.capath="D:/wamp64/bin/php/php7.1.9/extras/ssl/cacert.pem"
  1. 重启服务
